MCQ: Who are the co-founders of Tesla?
Choices: a: Martin Eberhard and Marc Tarpenning | b: Elon Musk and Ian Wright | c: J. B. Straubel and Michael Marks | d: Ze'ev Drori and Sergey Brin

MCQ: Which was Tesla's first car model?
Choices: a: Model S | b: Model X | c: Model 3 | d: Roadster

MCQ: Who became CEO of Tesla in 2008?
Choices: a: Martin Eberhard | b: Elon Musk | c: Ian Wright | d: J. B. Straubel

MCQ: Which Tesla model became the best-selling vehicle globally in 2023?
Choices: a: Model S | b: Model X | c: Model 3 | d: Model Y

MCQ: What was the source of funding for Tesla's Model S sedan?

Correct: Interest-bearing loans from the United States Department of Energy
